1330800.name: Nowhere New
1330800.description:
After crash-landing on a mysterious planet, novice engineer Nova Collins must unravel the secrets of a town’s messy past to escape it.

  • Explore an enigmatic town and its unique characters
  • Choose who to trust with your limited information
  • Learn more about this place and about yourself
  • Try not to lose what’s most important to you along the way…

Nowhere New is a mystery game that tells an intensely personal story about family, identity, and trust, intertwined with its engaging gameplay.


Check out the game's soundtrack, available on all major streaming services.
1330800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
